revised_title: Exploring the Control of Cell Growth Regulation by Tumour-Inducing Viruses
tldr: The author discusses the control of cell growth regulation by tumour-inducing viruses, focusing on the differences between fibroblastic and epithelial cells. They explore the effects of medium factors, attachment surface, and the role of calcium in cell growth. The study aims to clarify the mechanisms of growth control and understand the properties of viral transforming genes.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
